metas.title: Thomas Bernard - Engineering student in cybersecurity
metas.description: Thomas, engineering student in the cybersecurity field
metas.keywords: Cybersecurity, student, esaip, engineer, computer science
metas.author: Thomas Bernard

header.aboutme: French student in engineering school in the cybersecurity field, I am a fervent defender of online privacy aiming for a more secure and private online world.

voluntary.heading: Voluntary experiences
voluntary.title: WEIS - International Student Host Club
voluntary.description: Vice-presidency of WEIS, a club for international students at ESAIP. Mutual aid and organisation are essential and have enabled me to discover many cultures and to develop my managerial skills.
